class src.view.filebrowser.filebrowser.FileBrowser(callback: Callable[[Path], None], **kwargs)¶

Bases: Popup

FileBrowser serves as a file dialog, offering a FileChooserListView for folder selection and filename definition. When the “save” button is pressed, the FileBrowser calls the provided callback function, passing the selected file path to the callee.

Parameters:

  • callback (collections.abc.Callable) – A callable function that accepts a Path object and returns None.

  • kwargs – Additional keyword arguments to be passed to the Popup constructor.

cancel()¶

Dismisses the dialog.

Return type:

None

save()¶

Generates the file path, checks its validity, and invokes the callback function to share the selected filename.

Return type:

None

property path¶

Property for retrieving the current path value.

Type:

str

property filename¶

Property for retrieving the current filename.

Type:

str
